/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of modernity to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
